text: Nature can do more than physicians.
author: Oliver Cromwell

text: To me, the world's rather beautiful if you look at it. Especially nature.
author: David Hockney

text: To enter by reason means to realize the essence through instruction and to believe that all living things share the same true nature, which isn't apparent because it's shrouded by sensation and delusion.
author: Bodhidharma

text: Save for the wild force of Nature, nothing moves in this world that is not Greek in its origin.
author: Lord Acton
